website_summaries.verdict: PU leather case protects the phone from scratches. Nice-looking unit that provides a full cover.
pros: Easy to put on and take off as needed
Will protect the phone from dirt and scratches
Case is configured so that it won't interfere with wireless charging process
Reinforced corners provide a little extra protection
A nice grip to ensure you'll hang onto it
cons: Won't protect against falls from height
Can be difficult to press the buttons

customer_reviews.title: High quality and gorgeous-- but colors are not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. Seems like super high quality especially for the cost and is both attractive and protective. It's a lot more "feminine" looking in person, as the color is more of brassy/copper and is lighter than in the pictures. Also the outline of the cutouts and the buttons are a very noticeable and bright shiny gold, which you can't tell at all in the pictures. Luckily I love the way it looks in person more than on here, but I had to knock off a star just so others can beware if they are looking for the masculine dark brown leather in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great, design.
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred full coverage on the bottom; I feel like if it falls, and the bottom of the front gets damaged, a full coverage case might well have prevented damage. BUT, that is just integral to the design, so it’s not a defect, just something I didn’t notice before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Baron M. Gera

customer_reviews.title: Seriously this case is awesome and such a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this case is awesome and such a bargain. I had my doubts but went with the reviews and it was worth it. I use it on my iPhone 8 Plus and it works for wireless charging too.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Slim, lightweight, sturdy iPhone 8plus case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great iPhone 8 Plus case. I had originally purchased a case that looked very durable... it was beyond frustrating. It was too bulky and it interfered with my using the phone properly. This case is thin, sturdy, lightweight, and does not interfere with use of the controls, speakers, camera, etc.. Even though my pockets are extraordinarily small; in a pinch I can slide it at least halfway into my pocket if I need my hands for something. No chance of that with the other case!!! I may buy another as a back up...
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Cover for looks, NOT phone protection !!!
customer_reviews.text: Drop my phone off my knee, cover is chipped bad after first drop. It also “ does not “ cover bottom of phone at all. Second drop, fell from my hand, hit ground on bottom and already crack my corner of screen, fortunately I have screen protector or could have been worse. It looks great and feels good, but this cover NOT made for phone protection at all. I would not recommend this case at all! Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 compliments first day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dig this case. I wanted to move away from the bulky tactical looking case so I chose this based on reviews and a picture. It’s very classy looking in person and a bit more mature than the otter box looking cases. Stylish and sleek with rose gold that pops against the leather. With almost everyone sporting the same ol case this one stands out.
customer_reviews.author: Tatood

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very elegant and very nice to the touch. A great alternative to the bulky cases. I haven't dropped my phone yet (hopefully I won't) but his case is slightly raised by the screen, which can offer some protection if it happens to fall. No scratches yet to the case. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Naddy2.0

customer_reviews.title: Pretty snazzy case for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It fits snugly on the iPhone 8+ and the gold details are a nice touch. It has a nice feel to it and doesn’t interfere with the phone’s functionality at all. I think it looks pretty snazzy with the all black iPhone. My only very minor complaint is that the opening on the back of the case isn’t centered over the Apple logo on my phone. I’m sure that has to do with the case being designed for the 7+ and my phone being the 8+. It is a great case and even looks nicer than the $50 one my husband purchased from the Apple store! Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hausig

customer_reviews.title: Out of the ordinary
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I saw and felt this case in my hands it was sold with a 5-star rating score. The leather stands up lovely. Not many people have known about these real cases bc they might just be interested in what the social media is sharing with the world. I like to have fresh items that people will look twice at what is it I was holding. Great job on the manufacturing of this product. I will definitely look more into your products along with very fair prices.
customer_reviews.author: Cáno

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sleek, lightweight case...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sleek looking case and a great value. Definitely minimizes big, plus size pho. It appears sturdy enough, but if you need heavier protection, then this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks very upscale. Does great protection. Very slim. I have dropped my phone multiple times and it perfectly saved it. Only downside of product is that it’s made of leather and surface after 4-5 month due to normal wear gets worn.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and minimalist
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this case because it looks good. It’s not the most protective kind of case but the leather is stylish and a good quality for the price. Couldn’t give it 5 stars because it did wear out quicker than expected, the corners peeled from keeping it in my jean pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Professional, but Buttons Don’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this case. The colors are very pretty, and it looks professional. The issue is the buttons. They did not all work properly. The volume up button seemed to work fine, but the volume down button seemed stuck, and would constantly turn the volume down. Other reviews say this case worked great, maybe I got a defective one....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Good. I've been using for 3 months, and so far it worked great. It was a little too shiny for the logo window in the back (I dont like the glittery ones) and except that, its just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First few months great
customer_reviews.text: Had it a couple of months and it's very good. Buttons easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful design
customer_reviews.text: Just like describe, good material and afters some months is still perfect
customer_reviews.author: esther zelaya

customer_reviews.title: Case looks great and has a classic and crisp feel
customer_reviews.text: Case looks great and has a classic and crisp feel. Item is holding up just fine, but the buttons (2 volume, sleep button) don’t often respond when pressed. There is no extra padding added to help with this process. Also, don’t expect this case to hold up from high drops.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Photo is true to color
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel and shade of brown. Only 4 stars because I find the opening for the sound a little too deep for my finger unless I have a little longer nail. Otherwise fits well and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mcclintock

customer_reviews.title: Girly
customer_reviews.text: This case is a lot more bright red rather than maroon like the photo but as a woman I think it’s pretty. It has rose gold buttons and detail which is also nice but definitely girly.
customer_reviews.author: M.Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and as advertised. The phone inserts and removes easily. It has decent protection from daily use, the phone can also be put on a docking station without taking it out of the case because of the open bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Gustave J Millecker

customer_reviews.title: fit is as good as Apple case
customer_reviews.text: fit is as good as Apple case. the cutouts for the apple logo and camera, and the side buttons are gold color. the picture makes it look silver\chrome which is what I wanted. not happy about that part. buttons are a little hard to push, so that helps with accidental volume adjustments. all in all, it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: RVman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the leather case and the magnetic back. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyN

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like real leather.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my I-phone 8+. I bought this about a year ago & appearance remains excellent. Offers good protection while having a sleek appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... loves it and it had gold on it just like her
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my friend she loves it and it had gold on it just like her phone
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Leather looks cheap and plasticky, not textured. The color is off. The gold metal bots look brassy and cheap, I didn’t even see those in the photos and I don’t like them. Not what was pictured, but still okay. Just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits, Looks Great, Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It's a shade of brown you will love. The wear seems to be unnoticeable. Fits great, haven't dropped it yet so not sure how much protection it gives. Just don't drop your phone and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: McOnions

customer_reviews.title: Good quality case
customer_reviews.text: The leather feels good, it is not too heavy or too thick. And looks really good on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Saule Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Goooood
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Fits perfectly fine. And also allows the wires charger to work without having to take the phone out of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: ReY

customer_reviews.title: Understated elegance
customer_reviews.text: The leather with a touch of gold trim get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: nice leather, looks good
customer_reviews.text: and does a decent job of protecting the screen. No breaks after several drops....
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Cute cover, easy to install. I’ve dropped my IPhone 8plus numerous times and it’s protected (so far)
customer_reviews.author: Shamel J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but useless
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Christmas. We just tried it now because she was using another case our daughter bought her. It’s unusable. Volume buttons don’t work right, and it even stops the sleep button from functioning at all. Looks good but useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! The buttons on mine are almost reddish pink ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the right colour as listed. Very disappointed! The buttons on mine are almost reddish pink and not gold like the picture... also it isn’t brown, it’s more burgundy red. The photo shows colour variances but it is one solid colour which makes it look cheap!!!! But it’s $14.00 so it is cheap. Not worth sending back so ordered another case.
customer_reviews.author: BC82

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made looks and fits very good. Great price .
customer_reviews.author: Genos7

customer_reviews.title: Love it minus the logo imprint
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’ve had lots of compliments. Only complaint would be the logo is a little big and prominent but I understand they’re trying to represent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant case. I’m getting a lot of compliments since I put it on my iPhone 8 Plus. It’s also very protective. I hope it’s able to last long though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Classy & Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Love the look & constantly get compliments on it. So far its held up in durability but I haven't had it long enough to TRULY test that. Glad about this purchase & would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber &/ Or Samuel Richmann

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and fits snug on the phone. But the manufacturing is not on point like it should be. It’s difficult to operate the volume and power buttons with the phone case on. Often times I have to take my phone out of the case to operate those buttons which makes this phone case completely pointless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great value, no difference between this & the $50 leather Apple cover it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L

customer_reviews.title: Not good for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the button lineup, or the lack there of. I have an iPhone 7 and the buttons on the case don’t line up 100% to the actual phone; which makes them hard to push in. Also the mute switch is almost impossible to reach when it’s in silent mode
customer_reviews.author: Frankie B.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: everything about the case was great. Very affordable and amazing
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Not too durable
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months of normal usage, the leather is wearing off and peeling at the corners. It’s not from misuse, but just normal wear and tear. The case looks nice and has a good grip. The buttons are nicely sealed and work well, but just disappointed it didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper23

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Slim and easy to hold. Ive dropped it a few times and no scuffs or scratches to the material. Looks like a high dollar case
customer_reviews.author: Travis Webb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Bulkier than I expected. Doesn’t feel good to hold. Feels like its filled with styrofoam.. Pros: looks like it provides good protection. Otherwise as described. I personally know I won’t be using this. Basically unboxed, tried it on, kept it for 1 minute, removed it, reboxed, stored away.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marwan Dabbagh

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this case. It fits very snug and looks very nice. Very happy with purchase. It has very pretty rose gold accents around the apple cutout and camera cut out that really make the leather color pop
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: volume and on/off buttons do not respond well with the cover on. I have had leather cases that worked fine ... not this one.
customer_reviews.author: BruceRulz

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case. I like it so much, I’m going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: the quality is very good especially for such an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Who needs an expensive leather case if you have one of this. The case is exactly as advertise, the quality is very good especially for such an affordable price, this could easily go at least twice the current price for the quality itself, everything is aligned and centered.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castro

customer_reviews.title: It protects my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and protects my phone not Bulky. Overall a good buy, I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the case for a few days but it seems to be of reasonably good quality. I can't say how well it will wear over time, but, for the money, I think I made a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case and a perfect fit for my sons IPhone 8 plus
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: The model you need
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I expected, I like the color and will order again, when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Galina Kusin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, projects phone pretty good. However the case peels easy and deteriorates with use but overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Brayton Spann

customer_reviews.title: Almost feels like a phone case for females
customer_reviews.text: The middle ring portion and upper camera are is a bit shiny for my taste. You can slightly tell by the pictures. Almost feels like a phone case for females. All in all, good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: raymond song

customer_reviews.title: Rich looking
customer_reviews.text: Rich looking with an affordable price. My boss asked me I got a new phone the other day and my response was no, only a new case. Love my new case

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and Roooollll Tide
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE, 1st day at work got a compliment. I have a rose gold phone and the case has rose gold buttons and the trim for the camera opening and Apple logo.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking case for my new iphone 8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking ad feeling simple case. Much less expensive than Apple's Official case of the same style.

customer_reviews.title: Flashy gold accents, not subdued brassy tones as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The metallic accents on the iphone/brown leather case are not a subdued brassy color as pictured, they are a flashy (cheap) brilliant gold. The case itself is nice, but the pictures should be representative of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to hold , great feel and amazing color

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I loved how it looks on my iphone 8+
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it looks on my iphone 8+. the only problem is it isn’t easy to take screenshot or use volume buttons because of the holes for these buttons are too much narrow. But generally yes I liked this case and recommend for who are looking for an elegant case for their iphones.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, clean

customer_reviews.title: It is very slim and classy yet it protects the iPhone very well

customer_reviews.title: Beauty + Functionality = This Case!

customer_reviews.title: is minimal and comfortable to hold

product_meta.title: iPhone 8 Plus Case - Premium iPhone 8 Plus Leather Case - Best Mobile Cell Phone Cases Protective Back Cover - Slim Fit Vegan Artificial Synthetic PU Leather Case for Apple iPhone 8 Plus - Brown
product_meta.description:
Color:iPhone 8Plus Brown Would You not like to provide an extra protection to your super expensive iPhone8 Plus ? 

Do you believe a thin Premium PU Leather Case will be able to protect your precious from shocks and impacts and prevent the shattering of phone? 

Would you not like to protect your phone using an advanced design that’s able to seamlessly cover from edge to edge of your iPhone 8+ ? 

Well, everyone would want to protect a premium product like iPhone 8 Plus especially when it can be done at a negligible cost compared to the phone itself. We bring to you a elegant business back cover for iPhone 8 Plus that’s a brilliant example of modern technology and you will love it for its many incredible features and benefits:

✔ Perfect fits ONLY for iPhone8Plus 
✔ Protects Against Dust, Dirt, And Scratches 
✔ Quick And Simple Snap-On Installation iphone 8 plus unlocked phone case
✔ Microfiber Rose Gold Colored Outlining For Stylish Look of Case for iPhone 8 Plus 
✔ iPhone 8 Plus Leather Case consist of premium PU leather , durable and luxurious 
✔ Case for iPhone 8 Plus slim profile does not add any bulk to your device without sacrificing protection 
✔ mobile cell phone case for iphone 8 plus - excellent grip and comfort with leather outside finish 
✔ CIVPOWER Case for iPhone 8 Plus 8+ + easy to access to all buttons with responsive button cover 
✔ High Quality Premium Vegan Synthetic Artificial PU Leather iPhone 8 Plus case, CIVPOWER Design 

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE
